subject: 4.5 release candidate
msgSnippet: All, Following our discussions last week, we have incorporated the old JUnit4ClassRunner into 4.5. (The new runner is called BlockJUnit4ClassRunner because it
messageBody:
All,

Following our discussions last week, we have incorporated the old
JUnit4ClassRunner into 4.5. (The new runner is called BlockJUnit4ClassRunner
because it is organized as a "block" of "statements" instead of nested
procedures). Those of you who have written custom runners, we'd appreciate
it if you could try out the release candidate to make sure it supports your
existing runners.

Next up, release notes and then out the door!

Whew!

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
